item.title: English Learning Materials üìÅ
item.description: After teaching English for three years, I’ve amassed some class room resouces for various learners' levels. These levels are designated by the common european framework of reference for langauges (CEFR) and the material is mostly for levels A2-C1. Quizizz quizzes

item.title: Goo goo go go?
item.description: When I was growing up, I was always deeply interested in languages. I learned some Russian, Italian, Mandarin, and Spanish. During this time, I would occasionally hear the word ‚Äòcritical period‚Äô which refers to the hypothesis that prior to a certain time during childhood, a language can be learned to native proficiency and without effort given only input from a more knowledgeable other. From my own experience as a language learner, I believe this as well.
